title.label: Oh no! It crashes after iOS 9.02 update

This game suffers from the same problem all games of this type have problems with. Control toggles on a touch screen cannot respond fast or accurately enough. Add an option for gyro control and maybe it will work better.

Reached level 2 and game crashes every 30-60 seconds.  Followed Apples 5 step App fix...but no luck.  Worked fine for about 5 mins after the uninstall and install step.  No response from developer.  Found many complaints online similar to mine.  Real gem while it works...then it just doesn't.  Consensus is poor programming in handling the cache...yes, of course my cash they handle fine.

Ok this is one of my favorite games i have.I just finished campagin 2 and it was very fun.I have an idea for campaign 3...star trek.

The game is super fun until someone with a UFO joins the sever the player could be really bad and probably is could frag the entire other team the most annoying thing about the UFO is that it can't be earned by being a good player or playing for a really long time no you have to buy it the UFOs turned the game into a play to win game and I don't like that. The maker of the game should have realized this problem by now and fixed it they should let UFOs be unlocked all players instead of just  People who bought the second campaign or the have to make the UFOS a lot less over powered. Don't get me wrong I love the game it's super fun but the UFOs are too over powered
The game is awesome but really like its just a normal jet fighter warfare in the skies and then it turns into an alien warfare as in war of the worlds like really but add a campaign 3
I don't usually waste my time writing a review but this game and all the multiplayer options blew me away.

This is one of the best fighter pilot games any player worth their salt would want to play. Controlling it by tilting your device is especially fun. Highly recommended to those that enjoy air combat both on & offline!

Hey everybody you should really get this game. It's really fun, it's addictive no, and it's great to play with a group of friends. The UFO's are OP, but everyone has used them at some point. FYI creators of the game, the replay function closes the app the instant you stop recording, so that's a bug that needs to be fixed.
Game keeps crashing on iPhone 6 it is annoying!

I Love This Game The lag kicks in at a few times but after that it will never happen again I love this game in my opinion. I Have gotten into the second campaign and it's awesome! But Maybe you can make the flying more real like when you turn its just so easy. But otherwise This Game is awesome!

I fly in real life so I hate it when flying games won't let you control the roll, pitch, and yaw separately. This game does. The multiplayer can be glitchy sometimes but it works and it's fun. The campaign is ok. I wish it was a little longer or was harder to beat. If you like flying, it's worth the buy.

I wanna be able to save my progress points. This would be good in case I want to play on another device or if I accidentally deleted the app and had to redownload it. I prefer if a future update can have a login process that can save your earned points and make them ready for you if you had to login elsewhere. 
Thanks
Good game, but has a horrible crashing problem that ruins the positives of the game.

The campaign was a lot of fun and I was able to unlock a lot of planes for multiplayer. I love playing multiplayer on this game. There is only one thing that I can't stand about this game, the UFOs. They are way way overpowered in multiplayer. Please create an option when setting up a game for no UFOs or please nerf them so everyone else can enjoy playing this game. I admit I was a UFO user for a while, but I started to feel like a jerk when I would come out with 40kills-4deaths every match. It's really not fair. Please nerf them! Thanks

The controls for the tutorial are so hard to control and you can't change them I know you don't have to play the tutorial but I finished everything and you should have a way to save your game and load it again by email or something
I love this game. Feels like I'm in a fighter jet
Plz make replay kit work with iPad 4 +
I can't control the plan by tilting the phone now, I don't know what happened. Anyone else have the same problem?

The campaign is great but as soon as you get into multiplayer it's all just people locking onto you with missiles. Absolutely no skill a monkey could do it please take out missiles in multiplayer or make them a unlockable at the end of the game it's really annoying.
Thanks. The lag is no more.
Must download

This game is very good. My problems with it are: micro transactions(*grumble*) and the lag. The lag appears every now and then. But when it happens I usually get 2 frames per second. Atypical games fix this!
This is a great, fun flying game. Great controls and graphics. 10/10 would recommend.

I got this game when it was free and it has been pretty good! The mechanics are smooth and easy to use, the graphics and animations are well done, and the gameplay is engaging. (Even though the campaign is a bit easy.) All together, this game is well built. 

However, sometimes it fails to launch and the multiplayer doesn't always work. It cannot seem to connect every now and then. That is mainly when choosing a certain match though. The auto-join function usually works, but you don't know what you'll get. 

That said, these problems are not very detrimental and I have confidence that they will be solved by the developers. In a multiplayer match, I have never had noticeable glitches or lag! 

On whole, a very good game!
I've never played an aircraft game that has been as good as this one although it lags occasionally it has been an amazing game
This started when I was in the second campaign I was crashing into invisible things I got so annoyed but it that I almost deleted the game so please fix this other than that great game
